doc.title: Mantra Girl Presents: Advanced Kundalini Yoga for the Spiritual Warrior
doc.plot: Join Erin Kamler (Mantra Girl) and friends in beautiful Malibu, California for powerful, energetic Kundalini Yoga for the Spiritual Warrior. This fast-paced class will help improve circulation and elimination while building the flexibility and endurance necessary to be a true spiritual warrior. Using music from her album Mantra Girl, Erin will lead us through chanting meditations to connect to our creative consciousness and heal ourselves. Get ready to sweat and be transformed!
